about_the_game:
The ENCLAVE Digital Deluxe Content includes exclusive Hi-Res Paintings, Character Art and Sketches, as well as a detailed Walkthrough (English only).

Included in this Digital Deluxe Content:

  • Hi-Res Paintings
  • Character Art
  • Promo Cards
  • Sketches
  • Detailed Walkthrough for both Campaigns [English only]
detailed_description:
The ENCLAVE Digital Deluxe Content includes exclusive Hi-Res Paintings, Character Art and Sketches, as well as a detailed Walkthrough (English only).

Included in this Digital Deluxe Content:

  • Hi-Res Paintings
  • Character Art
  • Promo Cards
  • Sketches
  • Detailed Walkthrough for both Campaigns [English only]

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.10 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any, supported by OS
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader

name: Enclave - Digital Deluxe Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF Reader
